headline: Travelers Europe appoints new COO
summary: Mike Lawton will be responsible for overseeing the day-to-day business operations of Travelers Europe.

headline: TRV Rises 9.5% in a Year but Lags Industry: How to Play the Stock
summary: Travelers gains from strong renewal rate change, retention and an increase in new business supported by a compelling portfolio and solid capital position.

headline: Travelers Europe Names Mike Lawton Chief Operating Officer
summary: LONDON, February 17, 2025--Travelers Europe today announced that Mike Lawton has been appointed Chief Operating Officer. Lawton will report to Matthew Wilson, Chief Executive Officer of Travelers Europe, and oversee the day-to-day business operations and implementation of the company’s strategy.
